articles.title: Qinary Unveils Innovative AI Search Blueprint for Market Leadership
articles.summary: Qinary has launched a new AI search blueprint aimed at helping med spas and real estate professionals establish market leadership. This new service uses AI-driven insights to ensure these businesses are the first choice for consumers. The blueprint connects marketing aspects into a cohesive ecosystem, simplifying workflows and enhancing decision-making.

articles.title: Civil Service Consumer Corporation Launches Discounts on Over 350 Products Across Jordan
articles.author: //Petra// AF
articles.summary: The Civil Service Consumer Corporation launched discounts and promotional offers on over 350 food and non-food items in all its markets, with reductions ranging from 7 to 45 percent. Consumers can also order items online through the "Averat" delivery app or the corporation's online store and mobile app, "Civil Consumer Store."

articles.title: Best stain remover for clothing: Meet the ‚Äògenius' $25 fashion hack saving Aussies outfits across the country
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: lovebasiq launched Smudge Wipes in December 2024, a designer-approved makeup stain remover for clothes. These wipes are designed to remove makeup stains like foundation, lipstick, and fake tan from fabrics. With a high customer rating and use by stylists at Melbourne Fashion Week, Smudge Wipes are gaining popularity as a must-have stain removal solution.

articles.title: Walmart embracing AI
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Retailer's products are now accessible for purchase through OpenAI's ChatGPT. This integration provides a new channel for customers to buy products.

articles.title: Hillshire Farms enters frozen aisle
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company launched two new frozen products. The launch involves the introduction of these products to the market.

articles.title: Wavemaker launches national campaign for ALDI‚ÄìDoorDash partnership
articles.author: Frances Sheen
articles.summary: ALDI has launched a delivery service through a partnership with DoorDash in Australia. Wavemaker has unveiled a nationwide media campaign to promote this new offering, focusing on mass awareness and driving trial among ALDI's core audience. The campaign utilizes various channels, including outdoor, broadcast, digital screens, audio, and social media.

articles.title: Top-rated hair dryer with over 300 purchases this month drops to just $79 at Amazon Australia
articles.author: Holly Hampton-Thayers
articles.summary: Dreame has launched the Gleam Hair Dryer, a lightweight and efficient device with intelligent temperature control and negative ionic technology to minimize damage and reduce frizz. The hair dryer, which is currently on sale at Amazon Australia, is being praised for its performance, speed, and ability to maintain hair's natural shine, with users reporting healthy hair.

articles.title: 2026 Mercedes-AMG G63 Offroad Pro brings more muscle
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz is expanding its G-Class model line and developing a smaller, electric-only version, tentatively named the Mini G. The Mini G is expected to utilize a ladder frame.

articles.title: Meet vivo Y04s: All-day power at just Php 6,499
articles.author: INQUIRER.net
articles.summary: vivo launched the vivo Y04s smartphone on October 20, 2025, priced at Php 6,499. The Y04s features a 6000mAh battery, 8GB RAM, 256GB storage, and is available in three colors: Titanium Gold, Jade Green, and Crystal Violet.

articles.title: Notre Dame's new 'The Bend' merch flies off the shelves
articles.summary: Notre Dame introduced new merchandise called 'The Bend'. The product is experiencing high demand, indicated by reports of it 'flying off the shelves'.

articles.title: KCtoday's 2025 holiday gift guide: 90+ finds for everyone you love
articles.author: Emily Shea-Owen
articles.summary: This article presents a curated collection of gift ideas for the 2025 holiday season. It suggests a range of products including local items like the 'Tis The Season Package, SUPERMOM/SUPERDAD hats, and Convivial Candles, as well as nationally available items like Shiatsu foot massagers, UGG Tasman slippers, and Owala FreeSip water bottles. The article highlights a variety of gifts across different categories.

articles.title: Android is copying one of the most underappreciated iPhone features
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Google is refining a system-level LED intensity slider feature for the Android OS. The flash slider interface has been upgraded with a stylized depiction of a real-world flashlight and is currently being tested in the Canary channel. The feature's general availability is anticipated possibly with Android 16 QPR3 around March 2026.

articles.title: WhatsApp AI Images: Free Creation & US Launch üé®‚ú®
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: WhatsApp introduced a new 'AI Images' feature, accessible through the 'News' tab and 'Add status' option, enabling users to generate unique visuals directly within the app based on text prompts. The generated images are tailored for status updates, maximizing impact on mobile screens. Expect deeper integration with Meta AI, potentially allowing for more complex prompts and sophisticated image manipulation in the future.

articles.title: OpenAI's new browser puts Google in the hot seat, and Alphabet's stock drops
articles.author: News Feed Editor
articles.summary: OpenAI launched the ChatGPT Atlas browser. This new product challenges Alphabet's existing ecosystem.

articles.title: Dreamegg Unveils Sunrise 1+: The Next Generation Sunrise Alarm Clock for Stress-Free Sleep and Wake Routines
articles.author: Dreamegg
articles.summary: Dreamegg launched Sunrise 1+, an upgraded sunrise alarm clock and sound machine designed for stress-free mornings and calming nights. This next-generation device builds upon the original Sunrise 1 with intuitive controls, customizable features, and a richer sound library.

articles.title: New sugaringLA Franchise Opens in Shrewsbury, New Jersey, to Serve Growing Clean Beauty Market
articles.summary: SugaringLA has launched a new franchise in Shrewsbury, New Jersey, offering natural hair removal services. The location introduces the SUN Membership program, providing savings for returning clients, and is offering a 50% introductory discount for first-time clients.

articles.title: Heineken Joins A.I. Companionship Debate With Ad Promoting Real Friends
articles.author: Alexandra Tremayne-Pengelly
articles.summary: Heineken responded to Friend's A.I. companionship campaign with its own marketing efforts, emphasizing real-world interaction.  These efforts include a prototype phone case that flips when someone says 'cheers' and a minimalist smartphone developed in collaboration with Bodega, designed to limit digital dependence and encourage social interaction.

articles.title: This Minimalist New Swiss Army Knife Boasts Not One But Two Rare User-Friendly Features
articles.author: Steve Mazzucchi
articles.summary: Victorinox has launched the Alox Refined Collection, a new line of Swiss Army Knives featuring contemporary styling and functionality. The collection includes the OneFold, Synergy, and Synergy X models, all incorporating a locking blade and a pocket clip, which are uncommon for Victorinox. The Alox Refined Collection is designed for urban EDC and available for under $100.

articles.title: Starbucks Addresses Concerns That Robotic Baristas Will Take Over Stores
articles.author: Michael Nied
articles.summary: Starbucks is implementing AI via the Green Dot Assist, a virtual assistant designed to help baristas in real-time with crafting drinks and resolving store issues. The company plans to expand the AI's use to streamline mobile ordering, envisioning a future where customers can place orders via voice command.

articles.title: The Looming Infrastructure Issues That Could Doom ChatGPT's Atlas
articles.author: Cortney Harding
articles.summary: ChatGPT launched Atlas, an AI-enabled browser, following an agreement with WalMart to enable in-app purchases. However, initial testing revealed limitations in functionality, particularly with restaurant bookings, highlighting challenges related to legacy systems and data integration. The article suggests that these backend issues could hinder the success of new AI-powered tools if connectivity and data system problems are not addressed.

articles.title: Everybody's Favorite Skin-Saving Body Wash Is On Rare Sale Right This Second
articles.author: Griffin Wynne
articles.summary: Dove's shea butter and vanilla 'Pamper' and peony and rose oil 'Renew' body washes are on sale at Amazon, praised for their moisturizing and luxurious qualities. Additionally, Crest 3D Whitestrips, Aquaphor lip balms, Oral-B Genius X Limited rechargeable electric toothbrush, acne patches, Bioderma shower oil and Av√®ne's moisturizing melt-in balm are highlighted featuring discounted prices and features.

articles.title: Made in Canada: Spooktacular Halloween gifts and treats for the young and young at heart
articles.author: Lindsey Ward
articles.summary: Great Pretenders launched a poncho-style Halloween costume. Dough Parlour introduced a six pack of Monster Scoops play dough. Escents released Halloween-themed shaped soaps. Smart Sweets offers Halloween Lillipops with less sugar.

articles.title: NYC Police Seek Woman After Newborn Abandoned at Penn Station
articles.summary: OpenAI launched a web browser to compete with Google Chrome.

articles.title: Is Sora's Hype Real? Here's How You Can Join the AI Video Revolution Now
articles.author: i My Fone
articles.summary: iMyFone launched Novi AI, an AI video creation platform, offering features like story-to-video, image-to-video, and text-to-video generation. Novi AI aims to provide immediate access to AI video technology with multiple model options, including a 'Sora2 model', contrasting with the limited accessibility of OpenAI's Sora 2.

articles.title: Is Sora's Hype Real? Here's How You Can Join the AI Video Revolution Now
articles.author: i My Fone
articles.summary: iMyFone has launched Novi AI, an AI video generator, offering immediate access to AI video storytelling. Novi AI aims to provide an alternative to OpenAI's Sora 2 for creators looking to explore AI-driven video production.

articles.title: Is Sora's Hype Real? Here's How You Can Join the AI Video Revolution Now
articles.summary: iMyFone is launching Novi AI, an AI video generation and storytelling platform, providing creators with immediate access to AI-video technology. Novi AI empowers users to transform concepts into cinematic-quality videos within minutes, offering features like story-to-video, image-to-video, and text-to-video generation.

articles.title: A One-of-a-Kind Global Culinary Adventure - No Passport Required! eat2explore launches immersive All-Ages cooking kits with global recipes, expert-curated drink pairings, playlists, and more
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: An award-winning brand is launching a new product designed to reimagine cultural exploration at home. This offering aims to solve the 'what's for dinner' dilemma and enhance connection during date nights, dinner parties, and solo experiences.

articles.title: Google Outlines Latest Demand Gen Updates
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Google launched its second 'Demand Gen Drops' update, including new customer acquisition goals for YouTube campaigns like New Customer Value Mode, High Value New Customer Mode, and New Customer Only Mode. They have also released AI-generated video ad option and updated Target CPC bidding which helps to create videos for your campaigns without effort or production cost.

articles.title: Paul Pogba begins new career as ex-Man Utd star's wife helps launch of clothing line ahead of return from doping ban with Monaco
articles.author: Yahoo Daily News
articles.summary: Pogba has launched a new clothing range named 'Pogba MDXCIII'. Pogba enlisted his wife's help for the launch of his clothing brand.

articles.title: Switch to Metro by T-Mobile and score a free 5G Samsung or Motorola smartphone
articles.author: Rachel Cortez
articles.summary: Metro by T-Mobile is offering select 5G smartphones, including the Samsung Galaxy A16, Samsung Galaxy A15, and Motorola Moto G 2025, for free to new customers who switch their number and sign up for an eligible unlimited plan. The offer is valid for up to 4 lines and requires payment for the first month of the plan, which starts at $40 per month.

articles.title: Ghana: First National Bank Marks 10 Years in Ghana
articles.summary: First National Bank is celebrating 10 years in Ghana, marking a decade of innovation in the financial sector. Launched with a digital-first approach, First National Bank introduced new banking methods, including a mobile banking app, ATMs, and online banking platforms. The bank is also developing a 'next-generation banking platform' to enhance the customer experience.

articles.title: My cat and I both love this self-cleaning litter box, and it just got a ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Whisker released the new Litter-Robot 5 series, featuring advanced capabilities. Consequently, the previous generation of Litter-Robot is now available at a discounted price.

articles.title: The Day ChatGPT Became Your Personal Shopper
articles.author: Emma Albright
articles.summary: On September 29, 2025, OpenAI and Stripe launched the Agentic Commerce Protocol, enabling instant purchases from Etsy within ChatGPT. ChatGPT users are slated to gain access to over 1 million Shopify merchants. Google also announced its competing protocol, AP2, and companies like Microsoft, Amazon, and Meta are building similar systems.

articles.title: New Yorkers defaced subway ads for Friend's AI wearable. Then Heineken joined the fray with a cheeky billboard.
articles.summary: Heineken launched an ad campaign referencing Friend's AI wearable ads to promote the importance of real-life social interactions. Heineken uses AI to optimize logistics and support creative teams but believes in prioritizing human connection over technology replacing meaningful moments. The campaign has garnered positive social media engagement.

articles.title: Google Fi is getting AI-powered noise filters and RCS web messaging
articles.author: Andrew Liszewski
articles.summary: Google Fi Wireless is introducing several new features, including RCS messaging support, AI-powered call quality improvements that filter out background noise, and an expanded Wi-Fi Auto Connect Plus feature available in millions of locations across the US. They are also upgrading the Google Fi mobile app with AI to generate billing summaries for users and offering a limited-time promotion for new subscribers.

articles.title: AI voice ordering, new menu items teased by Starbucks CEO as possible changes
articles.author: Saleen Martin
articles.summary: Starbucks is exploring AI voice ordering, allowing customers to order via their phones.  They also launched Green Dot Assist, an AI-powered virtual assistant for baristas. Additionally, Starbucks is introducing new menu items, including artisanal pastries and protein-forward breakfast options, potentially expanding into alcoholic beverages in select locations.

articles.title: Houston, we have a blowout: The Dyson Supersonic Origin is 29% off and ready for liftoff
articles.author: Victoria McDonnell
articles.summary: The Dyson Supersonic Origin Hair Dryer is being promoted during the Amazon Holiday Beauty Event with a 29% discount. This hair dryer uses intelligent heat control to protect hair, resulting in increased shine, smoother strands, and reduced frizz. It features multiple settings and a high-speed digital motor for controlled airflow.

articles.title: How luxury automakers use fragrances to elevate the driving experience
articles.author: Keenan Thompson
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz introduces AIR BALANCE, an in-cabin fragrance system available in models like the AMG E53 Hybrid, featuring adjustable scent intensity and ionization. Lincoln offers 'Digital Scent' in the Navigator and Nautilus models, providing a choice of three scents. Other brands like BMW (formerly), Genesis, Rolls-Royce and Audi also offer similar fragrance options in their luxury vehicles.

articles.title: Shoppers queue up more than four hours early for opening of new Bolton store with lure of ‚Äòsupermarket sweep' run
articles.author: Adam Maidment
articles.summary: Iceland launched its new Food Warehouse store in Bolton on October 21st, attracting large crowds with offers like free vouchers, air fryers, and a 90-second supermarket sweep. The new store features multi-buy deals and exclusive ranges from brands like Slimming World and TGI Fridays.

articles.title: How A Flutter App Development Company Transforms Businesses
articles.summary: Flutter, Google's open-source framework, allows businesses to build cross-platform mobile applications for Android and iOS from a single codebase, enabling faster deployment and reducing development costs. The framework supports dynamic widgets, customizable layouts, and real-time performance testing, making it easier for companies to introduce or launch and maintain high-quality mobile applications more efficiently and effectively.

articles.title: Small innovations, big impact: How China leverages technology to enhance daily life
articles.author: Meng Fanzhe (
articles.summary: China is introducing innovations across sectors. The Fuxing CR450 high-speed train is set to improve travel efficiency, and commercial space enterprises are launching satellites to enhance agricultural practices. Furthermore, nuclear power units like Hualong One are generating significant electricity, contributing to household power needs.

articles.title: Liquid Agency Launches Ai Studio to Supercharge Brand Creativity at Scale
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Liquid, a brand consultancy, launched Liquid Ai Studio‚Ñ¢, a new service designed to assist enterprise brands in creating more content with higher fidelity and brand consistency. The launch aims to provide solutions for content creation within enterprise brands.

articles.title: OpenAI launches Atlas web browser OpenAIÊé®Âá∫AtlasÊµèËßàÂô®
articles.summary: OpenAI has launched a web browser. This new product aims to compete with Google and Microsoft for control of internet access tools.

articles.title: Soft and silent: This bamboo mattress protector is an ideal bedroom addition
articles.author: Ellis Cochrane
articles.summary: Panda London launched the Bamboo Mattress Protector, which is waterproof, hypoallergenic, and designed to be unobtrusive under sheets. The protector is made from a blend of bamboo and cotton, offering moisture-wicking and antibacterial properties. It is machine washable and suitable for various mattress types, with a 30-night trial and two-year guarantee.

articles.title: Gentle Natural Soap for Sensitive Skin
articles.summary: Soap So Fresh introduces its Sensitive Skin Natural Soap, a vegan bar handcrafted from plant-based ingredients, free of sulfates, parabens, and artificial fragrances. This soap nourishes delicate skin with natural oils, vitamins, and minerals, leaving it soft, balanced, and refreshed.

articles.title: OpenAI set to unveil AI browser with ChatGPT integration
articles.summary: OpenAI will announce a new product today at 10 am PT/1 pm ET. The announcement was teased on social media.

articles.title: Navratri-Diwali Boom: Tata Motors Hits Landmark 1 Lakh Deliveries; Sales Jump 33%
articles.author: NDTV
articles.summary: Consumer demand strongly drives the performance of a company, especially for its Sports Utility Vehicle (SUV) line up, including the Nexon.

articles.title: PWHL Vancouver Unveils Inaugural Jerseys, Name And Logo Coming Before Season
articles.author: The Hockey News
articles.summary: PWHL Vancouver introduced their first jerseys. The team plans to reveal its name and logo by the 2025-26 season.

articles.title: "Just warm milk": People are trying Tyra Banks' "hot ice cream," to mixed reviews
articles.author: Anna Good
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' sMiZE & Dream brand launched 'hot ice cream,' a heated version of their existing ice cream, marketed as a 'soothing, silky' twist on traditional frozen treats. It is served in cups with toppings and is currently available at their Darling Harbour flagship in Sydney for a limited time. Initial reactions on social media have been mixed, with some praising its flavor and texture while others compare it to warm milk or a melted McFlurry.

articles.title: Android 16: List of Vivo phones eligible for OriginOS 6
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: OriginOS 6 features a new user interface inspired by Android 16's Material-3 Expressive UI. The updated OS will offer dynamic glow, ambient light, and gradient glow options.

articles.title: Starbucks CEO touts mind-reading ‚ÄòAI barista' that predicts coffee orders before customers arrive
articles.summary: Starbucks is implementing AI through internal technology like 'Green Dot Assist,' a barista assistant tool currently rolled out to more stores after a June pilot. Future developments focus on AI predicting customer orders through the Starbucks app. In addition, Hudson Yards in New York City uses an AI-powered robot named Jarvis to make customer drinks.

articles.title: NxGen Brands, Inc. Announces Company Expansion into New Warehouse Space
articles.author: Nx Gen Brands Inc.
articles.summary: NxGen Brands, Inc.'s subsidiary, Genesee Candy Land, is expanding its current location by approximately 3000 sqft due to early growth. This expansion will streamline shipping and receiving, allow for larger ingredient orders, and enable entry into new product categories.

articles.title: B&M shoppers swear new ¬£3 shower gels 'smell exactly like' Lush
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M has launched new shower gels, 'Sweet Dreams' and 'Frosted Fairy,' priced at ¬£2.99 each. These scents are reportedly similar to Lush's 'Sleepy' and 'Snow Fairy' collections, providing a budget-friendly alternative. The B&M range also includes matching body butter and body sprays for ¬£3.49 each.

articles.title: B&M shoppers wowed by new ¬£3 soaps that 'smell just like Lush'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M has introduced new shower gels, 'Sweet Dreams' and 'Frosted Fairy,' inspired by Lush's popular scents like 'Sleepy' and 'Snow Fairy.' These 500ml shower gels are priced at ¬£2.99, offering a cheaper alternative to Lush's products. B&M also offers matching body butter and body sprays for ¬£3.49 each.

articles.title: B&M fans can 'save a fortune' with new ¬£3 shower gels 'just like Lush'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M has introduced new skincare items, including shower gels, body butter, and body sprays, inspired by Lush fragrances, offered at lower prices. Aldi has reintroduced its Sweet Angel shower gel, while Primark offers the Frost Angel collection. Lidl launched a range of shower gels that replicated some popular fragrances sold by the cosmetic brand last year.

articles.title: Partnerize Launches VantagePoint‚Ñ¢, the First GenAI Conversion Attribution Solution for the Machine-Mediated Market
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Partnerize has launched VantagePoint‚Ñ¢, a new AI-driven attribution solution designed to measure the influence of AI-surfaced content on consumer purchases. This tool, born from the acquisition of Konnecto, provides full-funnel visibility, behavioral clarity, and actionable insights without requiring integrations or data sharing. Brands like Hubspot, Love Holidays, Saatva, and Shopify have already adopted VantagePoint.

articles.title: T-Mobile for Business Celebrates Bold Business Innovation with the 4th Annual Innovate Awards
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: T-Mobile's Innovate Awards recognize organizations leveraging T-Mobile's 5G network to enhance or launch new products and services. Tractor Supply is using AI and a mobile app powered by T-Mobile 5G to improve customer experience, while Axis Energy Services utilizes T-Satellite for safer and more sustainable energy solutions. Additionally, UNLV's Black Fire Innovation hub uses T-Mobile 5G to power a smart kitchen lab for improved efficiency and guest experiences.

articles.title: Teachable Unveils Bold Rebrand and Product Vision to Power the Future of Real-World Learning
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Teachable launched a comprehensive rebrand and product vision focused on modern learning. The enhancements include a redesigned student interface, mobile-optimized education with iOS and Android apps, and global scale through one-click translations and local pricing. Teachable is also focusing on non-linear learning pathways and enterprise-scale teaching features for the coming year.

articles.title: 25 Target Items To Get The Kids Out The Door For School
articles.author: Raylyn Paquin
articles.summary: The article presents a variety of new products aimed at simplifying morning routines for families. These products include a Philips electric toothbrush with a game-based app, a Ninja coffee maker with coffee pod option, and a rapid egg cooker for quick breakfast preparation. These items are designed to save time and reduce stress during busy mornings.

articles.title: NYT to debut new TikTok-like "Watch" tab in its app
articles.author: Sara Fischer
articles.summary: The New York Times has launched a new 'Watch tab' within its main app, featuring a curated mix of short-form, scrollable, vertical news videos. This addition is intended to centralize the Times' journalism across various mediums and to engage a younger, newer audience. Beginning next year, ad space in the Watch tab will be available as an open beta for vertical video advertising.

articles.title: Nespresso coffee machine slashed to just ¬£59 in Amazon deal
articles.author: Kerri-Ann Roper
articles.summary: Nespresso Vertuo Pop by Krups is available on Amazon with a 41% discount, reduced from ¬£99.99 to ¬£59 for the Coconut White shade. The machine uses Nespresso Vertuo capsules and can make six different coffee cup sizes, heating up in 30 seconds with one-button control and automatic pod ejection.

articles.title: FBN¬Æ Invests in Manitoba with New Brandon Distribution Centre
articles.summary: Farmers Business Network (FBN) has opened a new distribution center in Brandon, Manitoba, to improve product and service access for Canadian farmers, ensuring timely delivery for the 2026 growing season. FBN has also launched six bulk fertilizer products, expanded their wheat protection lineup, introduced new ag equipment financing, and redesigned their digital platform to serve Canadian growers better.

articles.title: Beyond Meat stock soars after expanding Walmart distribution
articles.author: Louis Juricic
articles.summary: Beyond Meat is expanding the distribution of its plant-based meat products, including the new Beyond Burger 6-Pack, to over 2,000 Walmart stores nationwide. The expanded distribution includes three products: the Beyond Burger 6-Pack, Beyond Chicken Pieces, and Beyond Steak Korean BBQ-Style. This move aims to provide more consumers with access to Beyond's plant protein products.

articles.title: Aldi Ireland to sell new range of tools in middle aisle for DIY jobs
articles.summary: Aldi Ireland is launching a new range of DIY tools, including a 12V Cordless Air Compressor (‚Ç¨34.99), an Ash and Dirt Vacuum Cleaner (‚Ç¨39.99), a Multifunctional Sharpener (‚Ç¨19.99), a 105 Piece Bit Set (‚Ç¨9.99), and an XXL Screwdriver & Bit Set (‚Ç¨19.99). The products are available in Aldi stores nationwide starting from October 23rd.

articles.title: Girlfriend.ai Launches the Most Realistic AI Girlfriend ‚Äî So Human, It Feels Real
articles.summary: Girlfriend.ai has launched the latest version of its AI girlfriend platform, an emotionally responsive experience. The platform uses proprietary image generation and voice synthesis systems. It operates on a freemium model, allowing users to test the companion before subscribing. They are also preparing to expand its ecosystem with Boyfriend.ai.

articles.title: B&M's new ¬£3 shower gels 'smell just as good as ones at Lush'
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: B&M has introduced new shower gels, body butter and body sprays, including Sweet Dreams and Frosted Fairy, priced at ¬£2.99 - ¬£3.49. These products are inspired by Lush's Sleepy and Snow Fairy collections, offering a more affordable alternative. Shoppers have noted the similarity in scents and appreciated the cost savings.

articles.title: Guild Debuts New Product, Guild Navigator, to Transform Licensed And Certified Role Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Guild launched Guild Navigator, a new product within its Guild product suite, on October 21, 2025, in Denver.

articles.title: Touchstone Research Launches Generative AI UX Research Practice to Help Companies Build More Intuitive, Trustworthy User Experiences
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Touchstone Research launched its Generative AI UX Research and Usability Testing practice. This offering assists organizations in designing, testing, and refining AI-powered products through human-centered UX research, emphasizing trust and usability. The practice aims to help companies understand how users engage with generative AI technologies, ensuring intuitive and transparent experiences.

articles.title: Baileys launches new ‚Äòirresistible' treat at UK supermarkets just in time for Christmas
articles.summary: Baileys, in partnership with Arla Foods and Diageo, is launching a new product called Baileys Extra Thick Chocolate Cream in UK supermarkets. This new product is a chocolate cream designed to enhance desserts and is expected to be available in Lidl in October and other supermarkets in November. Additionally, Asda is offering Bailey's-inspired Chocolate & Irish Cream Liqueur Eclairs as part of their Exceptional range.

articles.title: Vultr Introduces Vultr VX1‚Ñ¢ Cloud Compute Plans, Setting a New Standard for Enterprise Price-Performance
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Vultr has launched its new Vultr VX1 Cloud Compute plans, powered by AMD EPYC processors, designed for enterprise cloud workloads, that delivers cost savings and performance improvements. The VX1 offers enterprises a cloud compute alternative to optimize cloud spend and maximize price-performance. VX1 instances also support Vultr Block Storage-backed boot volumes.

articles.title: Lenovo Unlocks New Level of Productivity and Creativity with Copilot+ PCs Powered by AMD Ryzen‚Ñ¢ AI Processors
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched the ThinkCentre neo Gen 6 desktop AI PCs, designed for small and medium-sized businesses. The series includes the ThinkCentre neo 55a Gen 6 all-in-one, the ThinkCentre neo 55s Gen 6, and the ThinkCentre neo 55q Gen 6, all powered by AMD Ryzen AI 300 Series processors.  Pricing starts at $549, $499, and $479 respectively.

articles.title: AiBuddy Launches Unified AI Voice CRM Platform
articles.summary: AiBuddy has launched an all-in-one AI platform that combines AI voice, CRM, and automation. The platform is designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering features such as AI Voice Agent Buddy for handling calls and customer data synchronization. The pricing model is modular, allowing businesses to pay only for what they need.

articles.title: Lifeist Relaunches Mikra Products onÔøΩAmazon.comÔøΩExpanding Access to Its Performance-Focused Portfolio
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Mikra's product lineup introduces new formulations and refreshed branding. These new offerings aim to attract consumers with accessible pricing.

articles.title: Eos' Steamy Shower Billboards Bring Self-Care to Busy Cities
articles.summary: Eos, a body care brand, has launched a digital out-of-home campaign to promote its Cashmere body wash range. The campaign utilizes digital billboards in cities like New York and Atlanta, creating interactive shower experiences for passersby. Since launching its Cashmere range, Eos' body wash products have driven 25% of total category growth.

articles.title: Portable GTV projector aims to make first-time projection joyful
articles.author: New Atlas
articles.summary: XGIMI has launched a new sub-brand and its first product, called the 'One'. The 'One' is described as an inexpensive lantern projector that transforms spaces into cinemas, social hubs, or creative zones.

articles.title: Tineco Unveils Next-Gen Power in Cordless Cleaning with All-New PURE ONE A90S
articles.author: Tineco
articles.summary: Tineco is launching the PURE ONE A90S, a new premium cordless vacuum cleaner as part of their PURE ONE S series. The A90S offers significant suction and adaptive performance features designed to deliver a smart and stress-free cleaning experience.

articles.title: Samsung's AI-powered series of products set off a new trend in purchasing home appliances during Double Eleven
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Samsung has launched a new line of AI-integrated home appliances during its Double 11 event. The series includes the AI God Refrigerator featuring a 9-inch AI control screen and AI ingredient recognition, the AI God Black Diamond Heat Pump Washing and Drying Flagship with AI Bubble Cleaning‚Ñ¢ technology, and the AI God Black Diamond Clothing Care Machine for specialty garment care.

articles.title: What are the best skincare products for men with oily skin?
articles.summary: Red One Perth offers tailored skincare solutions for men, including facial cleansers and moisturizers. The brand emphasizes practicality, performance, and confidence, providing results-driven skincare without unnecessary complexity. Red One Perth integrates high-performing ingredients into its skincare line, ensuring visible results without harsh chemicals or overwhelming routines.

articles.title: AWS outage exposes fragility of our ‚Äòsmart tech'
articles.author: Mary Harrington
articles.summary: Eight Sleep's internet-enabled mattress, featuring heart rate tracking, temperature adjustment, and sound playback, experienced disruptions due to an Amazon Web Services (AWS) outage. The outage caused mattresses to freeze or overheat, highlighting the reliance of this new product on cloud services and the potential drawbacks of the 'Internet of Things'.

articles.title: Eco-Products wins award for reusable containers
articles.author: Biz West Staff
articles.summary: Eco-Products, a Novolex brand, has launched its Veda reusable containers, designed for campus dining halls and corporate cafeterias. This new line features smart tracking technology, making reusable containers simple and trackable for sustainable food-service operations. The Veda system allows diners to purchase or borrow containers, return them to a scanning machine for credit, and enables thorough washing for reuse.

articles.title: NEO Battery Receives $2.5M Purchase Order of Customized Battery Solutions for Autonomous, Industrial Robotics
articles.author: NEO Battery Materials Ltd
articles.summary: NEO Battery Materials Ltd. has secured a $2,500,000 CAD purchase order and a Joint Development Agreement with a South Korean industrial robotics company. The agreement includes the supply of prototype and commercial lithium-silicon battery packs, with a targeted 74,000 mAh cell capacity, designed for Autonomous Mobile Robots (AMRs), humanoid platforms, and mission-critical service robots. These batteries are expected to surpass existing benchmarks and offer enhanced energy density and system safety.

articles.title: ‚ÄãLidl brings back ‚Äòmystery boxes' containing ¬£100 of goods for ¬£20
articles.author: Steve Farrell
articles.summary: Lidl is launching a limited run of 1,500 'mystery boxes' containing up to ¬£100 worth of middle aisle products for ¬£20, available for online order and home delivery. The new batch is Lidl's latest dabble in online flash sales.

articles.title: 7 Best New Walmart Gifts Under $10 Shoppers Are Grabbing This Week ‚Äî Best Life
articles.author: Leah Barrett
articles.summary: Walmart is offering several new products priced under $10, including bath bombs, mini books from ZURU, NeeDoh Color Change fidget toys, Crayola Scribble Scrubbie Pets, Classic Jenga Game, ZealSea face masks, and Klever Kits DIY Night Light Painting Crafts Kit. These items are targeted as affordable gifts.

articles.title: Celebrating a Global Milestone: P&G's Children's Safe Drinking Water Program Delivers 25 Billion Liters of Clean Water
articles.author: Mel Ndlovu
articles.summary: Procter & Gamble's Children's Safe Drinking Water (CSDW) Program has delivered 25 billion liters of clean water to families using the P&G Purifier of Water packet, which turns contaminated water into safe drinking water. This achievement, attained through innovation and partnerships, aims to provide clean water to underserved communities, promoting health, education, and community growth.

articles.title: It's Not A Missing Piece, It's An Evolution: Vivo On OriginOS 6
articles.summary: Vivo is launching OriginOS 6 to replace Funtouch OS on its devices, including the iQOO line. The rollout starts in November 2025 with flagship models like the X200 series, X Fold 5, and V60, followed by iQOO 13 and mid-range devices. OriginOS 6 aims to deliver a premium experience with a cleaner design, smoother animations, and better system stability.

articles.title: Philip Morris International Reports 2025 Third-Quarter & First Nine-Months Results
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Philip Morris International (PMI) is focused on a smoke-free future, investing in and commercializing smoke-free products like heat-not-burn devices, nicotine pouches, and e-vapor products. PMI's smoke-free products, including IQOS devices and consumables, and Swedish Match's General snus and ZYN nicotine pouches, have received FDA authorization for marketing and Modified Risk Tobacco Product status.

articles.title: If You Avoid Cleaning Like The Plague, Reviewers Say These 26 Products Make The Process So Much Faster
articles.summary: Amazon features a curated selection of cleaning products. This includes a hard water stain remover (Bioclean), duster sponges, a Levoit air purifier, a sink cleaner, and a vacuum cleaner among others. These products aim to solve common cleaning challenges and have received positive reviews for their effectiveness and ease of use.

articles.title: If You Avoid Cleaning Like The Plague, Reviewers Say These 26 Products Make The Process So Much Faster
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several cleaning products are highlighted, including Bioclean hard water stain remover, a vacuum cleaner with attachments, The Pink Stuff paste cleaner, an eufy robot mop and vacuum controllable by voice assistants, Iron Out rust stain remover, microfiber cleaning cloths, and an overnight tank cleaner. User reviews praise the products' effectiveness and ease of use in cleaning various surfaces and appliances.

articles.title: Yelp Expands AI Features to Make Local Discovery More Conversational, Visual and Seamless
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Yelp Inc. has launched its 2025 Fall Product Release, introducing over 35 new AI-powered features and updates. These include Yelp Assistant for answering questions about local businesses, Menu Vision for scanning menus, and AI-powered call answering solutions like Yelp Host and Yelp Receptionist for restaurants and local businesses.

articles.title: Auxia Introduces AI-Native UX That Unifies Decisioning, Content and Insights in One Interface
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Auxia introduced a completely redesigned, AI-native interface for its marketing platform. This redesign unifies Decisioning, Insights, and Content Generation, providing marketers with a single space to design, optimize, and analyze customer journeys.

articles.title: Ryder Secures 2025 Quest for Quality Honor for Value-Added Warehousing & Distribution
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Ryder provides a comprehensive suite of value-added services, specializing in contract manufacturing and packaging for both food and non-food items, including blending and filling dry powder and viscous products. Their services extend to display engineering, product launches, and multichannel programs, complemented by packaging customization, assembly, and kitting.

articles.title: AdShare Global Strengthens Global Advertising Collaboration through a Data-Driven Ecosystem for Global Brands
articles.summary: AdShare Global launched its Global Advertising Collaboration Strategy, designed to strengthen cooperation between global brands, professional communities, and digital markets. This framework aims to provide transparency, measurable performance, and data-driven innovation for brands across industries such as automotive, luxury, and fashion.

articles.title: Lumirada LTD Strengthens Global Advertising Collaboration through a Data-Driven Ecosystem for Global Brands
articles.summary: Lumirada LTD has launched its Global Advertising Collaboration Strategy, designed to foster cooperation between global brands, professional communities, and digital markets through data-driven and transparent systems. This strategy aims to connect brands with audiences via verified engagement systems, transforming traditional advertising into a performance-based ecosystem.

articles.title: Lidl's sell-out ¬£20 middle aisle 'Mystery Boxes' confirmed to return this week
articles.author: Rachel Williams
articles.summary: Lidl is relaunching its 'Mystery Boxes' for ¬£20, containing a variety of products ranging from electric nail staplers to noise-cancelling headphones, with some boxes including bonus item coupons for premium prizes like a Sharp 43-Inch 4K Ultra HD Roku TV. Also, Aldi is launching its own Video Doorbell for ¬£16.99.

articles.title: The 2025 Wonders Advent Calendar has $1,129 of luxe skincare for under $130
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Avant Skincare is launching its Wonders Advent Calendar 2025, a 12-day countdown of skincare products valued at $1,129, retailing for $139 (with a potential discount). The calendar features full-size and deluxe skincare products, including day cream, lip plumping treatment, and face masks, with some calendars containing a Golden Ticket for a chance to win up to $1,300 in Avant Skincare products. New for 2025, scanning the calendar's cover unlocks an augmented reality experience.

articles.title: Shark vs Dyson: From vacuum cleaners to hair stylers, which brand actually deserves your money?
articles.author: DANIELLE AMATO
articles.summary: Dyson and Shark have recently launched new models in both vacuums and haircare. Dyson's V16 Piston Animal is a new cordless vacuum, while the Airwrap Coanda Multi-Styler is a hair tool that uses controlled airflow. Shark released the Stratos vacuum, a competitor to the V16, and the FlexStyle, a more affordable alternative to the Airwrap. Shark's SpeedStyle Pro 5-in-1 is a worthy alternative to Dyson's SuperSonic hairdryer.

articles.title: Is your smartphone too big for your pocket? Welcome to the screen size paradox
articles.summary: Apple introduced the iPhone which was slim, thinner and matched the warmth of an ideal size phone. The recently launched iPhone 17 is big sized as compared to many introduced in early times and has a larger camera that covers 3/5th of the phone's area.

articles.title: How Havas London put design at the centre of Asahi Super Dry's new brand platform
articles.author: Ritupriya Basu
articles.summary: Havas London collaborated with global agencies to create 'Seek What Is Unique,' a new global platform for Asahi Super Dry, connecting the beer with its Japanese roots and unifying its brand image. The new design system focuses on a consistent 'feel' rather than a uniform 'look,' incorporating elements like retrofuturism, minimalism, and juxtaposition to create a dynamic and scalable brand identity. They have refreshed the design system, chose to preserve two sacred elements ‚Äì the logo and the silver ‚Äì both carrying deep brand equity.

articles.title: 1 item got rid of musty washing machine smell in 1 wash
articles.author: Chanelle Georgina
articles.summary: Dettol introduced the 5-in-1 Antibacterial Washing Machine Cleaner, priced under ¬£4, to kill bacteria, prevent odours, and remove limescale. The cleaner is used by pouring the entire bottle into the washing machine drawer and running a 60C wash without clothes, resulting in lasting freshness and cleaning the washing machine.

articles.title: 2025 Yezdi Roadster First Ride Review  Performance, Comfort & Features
articles.summary: Yezdi has launched the 2025 Yezdi Roadster motorcycle. A review assesses the motorcycle's performance, comfort, design, and features in real-world conditions, highlighting its blend of modern performance and retro charm.

articles.title: Inside Next's 2025 beauty Advent calendar
articles.author: Antigoni Pitta
articles.summary: Next has unveiled its 25 Days of Beauty Advent Calendar, retailing for ¬£95 with products valued over ¬£385. The calendar includes a variety of skincare, haircare, makeup, and accessories from brands like Rituals, Sanctuary, and Nuxe, available on the Next website. Golden tickets are hidden inside five calendars, leading to even more presents.

articles.title: IFF and BASF Announce Strategic Collaboration to Drive Next-Generation Enzyme and Polymer Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF and BASF are collaborating to develop IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials‚Ñ¢ technology platform. This partnership aims to create next-generation enzyme technologies for various applications, including fabric, dish, personal care, and industrial cleaning. The goal is to deliver sustainable solutions with enhanced performance and reduced environmental impact.

articles.title: Maximize Your Space with Stylish Pull Out Beds in Singapore
articles.summary: Ecozy Furniture introduces pull-out beds designed for modern Singapore homes, offering comfort, convenience, and style. These space-saving beds provide flexibility for guests or daily use without compromising on quality, making small spaces feel spacious and elegant.

articles.title: 48 Affordable Alternatives To More Expensive Products
articles.author: Samar Hadri
articles.summary: Several new product alternatives are being introduced as affordable options compared to established brands. Dreamlux leggings are presented as a cheaper alternative to Lululemon, while a TikTok-famous Soft perfume rollerball offers a budget-friendly alternative to Pink Sugar perfume. Essence's Lash Princess Mascara aims to provide a falsies look for a lower price compared to Too Faced Better Than Sex and L'Oreal Telescopic Lift.

articles.title: Louis Vuitton's 'designer' Nutella sells for close to R32 000 a jar!
articles.author: Garrin Lambley
articles.summary: Louis Vuitton has launched a new product: "Le Chocolat Maxime Fr√©d√©ric at Louis Vuitton", a luxury hazelnut-chocolate spread developed with pastry chef Maxime Fr√©d√©ric. The spread, initially sold at Louis Vuitton boutiques in Paris and London, quickly sold out and is now being resold online for significantly higher prices.

articles.title: IFF and BASF Announce Strategic Collaboration to Drive Next-Generation Enzyme and Polymer Innovation
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: IFF and BASF are collaborating to develop IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials‚Ñ¢ technology platform, creating next-generation enzyme technologies for fabric, dish, personal care, and industrial cleaning applications. The partnership aims to deliver breakthrough solutions that enhance cleaning performance, improve personal care formulations, and reduce environmental impact. This will involve innovative enzyme systems and biobased polymers, enabling customers to achieve superior performance while reducing resource consumption.

articles.title: AI Isn't Replacing Marketers‚ÄîIt's Making Us More Human
articles.author: Brian Irving
articles.summary: Lyft is leveraging AI to gain deeper insights into consumer behavior, enabling the creation of more authentic and emotionally resonant marketing campaigns. Furthermore, AI facilitates rapid concept visualization and iterative creative development, significantly accelerating the pace of marketing and creative processes.

articles.title: 41 Clever Things To Declutter Your Home For Good
articles.author: Sally Elshorafa
articles.summary: Amazon offers a variety of organizers for various home spaces. Some of them are: Rolling laundry sorter, laundry hamper that hangs from the door, adjustable mug organizers, cord organizer, toy storage bag, leggings organizing hangers, broom and mop organizer, vinyl record display holder, shelf dividers, leather cable and charger rollup organizer, shoe slots, under-cabinet drawer, honeycomb divider, over-the-door shoe organizer, set of Oxo food storage containers, adhesive hat hooks, handmade hat organizer, hanger stacker, over-the-door stuffed animal organizer, drink dispenser, transparent dividers, stackable clear drawers, hangable T-shirt organizer, Command spray bottle mount, closet cascaders, shelf organizer/extra hanging rod combo, pack of stackable organizer bins with drawers, magical ice cube tray with a lid, pans storage system, spices drawer organizer, acrylic fridge drawers, underwear and sock divider insert, bedside caddy, mounted towel rack, toothbrush holder and dispenser, peel-and-stick yogurt holder, over-the-cabinet storage shelf, drawer organizer, double-sided and portable nail polish organizer, tiny outlet shelf.

articles.title: Lidl is bringing back retro-inspired Smeg dupe that looks ‚Äòalmost identical'
articles.summary: LIDL is introducing a new range of middle aisle buys. The range includes the Silvercrest Espresso Machine for ¬£69.99, a dupe of the Smeg Espresso Coffee Machine, and the Tronic dehumidifier for ¬£74.99. Smyths Toys has revealed its top toys for Christmas 2025, including Hot Wheels for ¬£40.

articles.title: Google flips the script on leaks, 15 fans will get to test next Pixel before launch
articles.summary: Google is inviting a select group of 'Superfans' to test the unreleased Pixel 11 series. These testers will provide feedback on the devices, which are likely to feature a new design overhaul. The program aims to improve the Pixel series based on user input before the official launch.

articles.title: If your jumpers look worse for wear you may want to try ¬£3.99 Home Bargains product
articles.author: Ray Bonsall
articles.summary: Home Bargains is selling the Home Solutions Lint Remover, a battery-operated device priced at ¬£3.99, designed to remove lint from clothing. Additionally, they offer the Pifco Electric Heated Airer 230W for ¬£34.99, which is described as an energy-efficient solution for drying clothes indoors.

articles.title: IFF, BASF Unite for Next-Gen Enzyme, Polymer Innovation
articles.author: Mirage News
articles.summary: IFF and BASF are collaborating to develop IFF's Designed Enzymatic Biomaterials‚Ñ¢ technology platform. This collaboration focuses on creating next-generation enzyme technologies for fabric, dish, personal care, and industrial cleaning applications. The partnership aims to deliver breakthrough solutions at scale that enhance cleaning performance, improve personal care formulations, and reduce environmental impact.

The first 'ÂêØÂ¢É' product, featuring Huawei's Qianhui intelligent solution, is scheduled to launch in mid-2026.

articles.title: Beatrice Borromeo et Pierre Casiraghi : la signification des pr√©noms de leur ¬´ petite princesse¬†¬ª
articles.author: Vanity Fair
articles.summary: An apparel company is promoting its new line of high-end baby clothes. The company collaborates with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents or couples. These profiles are then used to present targeted advertising within partner apps.

articles.title: ÈõÖÊÄùËØçÊ±áËß£ÊûêÔºà157Ôºâ
articles.summary: New Channel (Êñ∞Ëà™ÈÅì) is promoting its autumn IELTS courses. The courses feature systematic vocabulary and question type training, aimed at helping students efficiently improve their IELTS scores. Interested individuals are encouraged to scan the provided QR code to learn more and register.

articles.summary: OpenAI is reportedly announcing a new web browser. This information suggests a new product launch by the company.

articles.title: Mouser Electronics New Product Insider: Over 16,000 New Parts Added in Third Quarter of 2025
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Mouser introduced new products between July and September. Additional details about these introductions are available on Mouser's newsroom and new products pages.

articles.title: What Is the Best Freelance Platform for Hiring a Product Designer?
articles.summary: Fiverr provides a service connecting businesses with freelance product designers. The platform offers access to designers with diverse expertise, transparent pricing, and secure payment systems. Fiverr's features aim to streamline the design process and ensure reliable collaboration for product development.

articles.title: What Is the Best Freelance Platform for Product Design Services?
articles.summary: Fiverr is positioned as a leading freelance platform connecting businesses with product design experts. The platform facilitates connections for services like 3D modeling, concept sketching, and full product development, providing verified designer profiles with work samples and client reviews. Fiverr ensures transparent and secure transactions with direct communication, progress tracking, and payment protection until final work approval.

articles.title: The Roleplay AI Platform Showdown: Loveon AI vs. The Competition
articles.author: Newsgram Desk
articles.summary: Loveon AI distinguishes itself by offering an uncensored AI chat environment, providing users with extensive tools for character creation and customization, enabling intricate personality maps, trauma responses, and relationship dynamics. Loveon.chat features an intuitive character discovery engine, simplifying finding top-rated user creations, which improves the realism of the available characters.

articles.title: 'Smartphone Robot': Chinese manufacturer unveils concept phone with a self-moving camera
articles.author: YINON BEN SHUSHAN
articles.summary: Honor has unveiled the 'Robot Phone,' a concept smartphone. The phone features a smart robotic camera mounted on a gimbal, capable of independent movement and shooting in any direction.

articles.title: Picsart Print: Transforming Digital Creativity into Professional-Quality Physical Products
articles.summary: Picsart has launched Picsart Print, a service allowing users to transform digital designs into physical products like business cards, mugs, and merchandise. The service integrates with Picsart's creative platform, offering design, editing, customization, and preview features in one place for a seamless design-to-print workflow.

articles.title: What New Technologies Enable Personalized Cosmetics for Each Customer's Unique Characteristics?
articles.author: Ellen
articles.summary: Proven Skincare analyzes ingredients and reviews to formulate customized skincare. L'Or√©al uses machine learning for faster product development. Unilever's POND'S SKIN INSTITUTE uses microbiome analysis to tailor skincare regimens.

articles.title: Huawei nova 14i Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: Huawei officially announced the nova 14i smartphone on October 1, 2025, and released it on October 8, 2025. The phone features a 7000 mAh battery with 22.5W wired charging, a 6.95-inch IPS LCD display, a Qualcomm Snapdragon 680 4G processor, and a dual-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main sensor. The starting price is P20,233.11.

articles.title: Top Body Washes for Smooth, Glowing Skin
articles.summary: The company introduces a range of new skincare products, including exfoliating treatments, acne-fighting cleansers, and hydrating formulas. These products feature various ingredients like exfoliating actives, glycerin, and blends of acids, targeting concerns like tan removal, rough skin, body acne, and dryness. All these products are paraben and SLS free.

articles.title: Top Face Scrubs for Glowing, Tan-Free Skin
articles.summary: Several skincare products are being promoted, including formulations with hyaluronic acid & kojic acid for hydration and collagen boosting, coffee & walnut blends for exfoliation and blackhead removal, and botanical formulas for brightening and smoothing skin. A luxurious gel scrub containing natural walnut extract is also highlighted for revitalization. These products are marketed for tan removal, exfoliation, and skin revitalization, suitable for both face and body, with ingredients like mandelic acid and walnut providing gentle yet effective exfoliation.

articles.title: Best Face Washes for Clean, Clear & Healthy Skin
articles.summary: A skincare company introduces several new products including a cleanser for a fresh, glowing look, a hydrating formula perfect for sensitive skin, a botanical exfoliant for visible glow, a treatment targeting acne with salicylic acid and niacinamide, a pimple fighter with neem, and an oil-control solution for acne-prone skin.

articles.title: 'It's honour to be in such a historic building' - luxury fashion shop opens in York
articles.author: Alice Kavanagh
articles.summary: Wyse London, a luxury women's retailer, opened a new store in York on October 7. The store offers elevated women's clothing and plans to host styling appointments, coffee mornings, and floristry classes. The official launch event is scheduled for November 4.

articles.title: Oudware Revolutionizes the Fragrance Industry with TikTok and Budget-Friendly Perfumes
articles.summary: Oudware subjects every new fragrance to a rigorous internal vetting process before introducing it to the market, ensuring only the best scents make it to the shelves. They evaluate each fragrance for its longevity, dry-down, and overall appeal, and stop marketing fragrances that receive negative feedback.

articles.title: BYD, Chinese rivals rise in Uzbekistan but can't outrun price war
articles.author: Selina Cheng
articles.summary: BYD's Song SUV is gaining traction in Uzbekistan, with consumers like Salavat Rashit Magazov choosing it over cheaper alternatives like the Chevrolet Lacetti due to its superior features and perceived luxury. The BYD Song SUV sells for $19,000.

articles.title: BM Digital Marketing Agency expands regional footprint with Dubai Media City relocation
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: A new content creation service launched, offering video shooting, photography, and editing. The service aims to enable businesses to enhance their digital presence through professional visuals.

articles.title: Shave.net Launches Educational Series: The Science and Ritual of the Perfect Shave
articles.summary: Shave.net has launched 'The Science and Ritual of the Perfect Shave,' an educational video and blog series. This series aims to educate men on blade design, shaving techniques, and skincare to improve their shaving experience. The series is available on YouTube, the Shave Blog, and social media channels.

articles.title: 28 Cheap Products With Magic Results
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: John Frieda introduces Frizz Ease Dream Curls Air Dry Waves Styling Foam for defining curls without extra time. Good Molecules launches Yerba Mate Wake Up Eye Gel, designed to soothe and moisturize the under-eye area using yerba mate and hyaluronic acid. Lumify also offers Eye Drops which reduce redness and brighten eyes for up to 8 hours.

articles.title: Best-selling Urban Jungle products worth knowing about from the Aussie-born cult-beauty brand
articles.author: Ariana Pezeshki
articles.summary: Urban Jungle launched its new "Golden Rule Body Gloss" for $42, a glossy body oil with squalane and 12 natural oils, promising a golden shimmer. Urban Jungle also offers best-selling products like "Melt Me Softly Cleansing Balm", "Cr√®me de la Cr√®me", "Glow With The Flow", and "Plump Fiction" .

articles.title: 21 Things From Target That'll Plain Save The Day For Busy Parents
articles.author: Raylyn Paquin
articles.summary: Infantino launched wrist rattles that can be attached around the wrist or the ankles. Munchkin released faucet extenders to help toddlers reach the water. Jool Baby introduced travel potty seat for little potty trainers.

articles.title: LIDL Detergent: 900+ Wash Test Winner! üß∫‚ú®
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Lidl's Formil detergent outperformed more expensive brands in testing, signaling a shift towards consumer preference for data-driven performance and value in private label products. Retailers like Lidl are investing in R&D to develop innovative private label products to challenge established brands. These trends impact the entire CPG landscape, leading to increased innovation and hyper-personalization.

articles.title: Leacock not going to opening of new Port
articles.author: Webmaster Nbsp
articles.summary: Olympic champion Julien Alfred has launched a new jewelry line. Proceeds from the collection will support her charitable foundation.

articles.title: Subway Unveils New Bread and Sauce Options: Grain Bread and Low Sugar Creamy Onion Sauce Expand Menu Choices
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: Subway has launched 'Grain' bread, a wheat-based loaf with sunflower seeds, quinoa, and oats, offering a nutty and healthful flavor. They also introduced 'Low Sugar Creamy Onion' sauce, containing less than 5 grams of sugar per serving, designed to complement existing menu items. These additions aim to cater to consumer demand for healthier and flavorful options.

articles.title: Quickcode.ai: Interview With CEO Shannon Hynds About The AI-Based Trade Compliance Company
articles.author: Amit Chowdhry
articles.summary: Quickcode.ai offers an AI-powered platform designed for trade compliance workflows, which includes features like compliance audits, regulatory checks, product classification, and continuous monitoring. Quickcode.ai has evolved from a basic compliance tool to a comprehensive platform that integrates AI for enhanced decision making, and the company is preparing to add Denied Party and Forced Labor Screening to the platform.

articles.title: NVIDIA & Google Cloud: AI & Industry 4.0
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google Cloud has launched G4 VMs powered by NVIDIA RTX PRO 6000 Blackwell Server Edition GPUs. NVIDIA Omniverse and Isaac Sim are also now readily available on the Google Cloud Marketplace. These offerings enable enterprises to construct digital twins and accelerate AI-driven robotics development.

articles.title: ManaMed¬Æ Secures FDA 510(k) Clearance for PlasmaFlow¬Æ X -- a Breakthrough, Compact Sequential Compression System ...
articles.author: The Facts
articles.summary: A new generation of SCDs offers significant improvements. These SCDs feature a footprint that is 30% smaller, double the battery life, modern USB-C charging, and an expanded LCD interface.

articles.title: 2026 Toyota LandCruiser FJ baby off-roader unveiled as new Suzuki Jimny rival
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Toyota has revealed the LandCruiser FJ, a smaller version of its iconic LandCruiser. This new model is designed to compete with the Suzuki Jimny and Renault Duster and features design elements from the FJ Cruiser SUV.

articles.title: No-Code AI Website Builder: Launch a Site in Minutes with Site.pro
articles.author: Class
articles.summary: Site.pro has launched a new AI website builder that allows users to create and customize websites using AI-powered commands via a chat interface. This new tool minimizes manual work by enabling AI to tweak websites in real time, manage website structure, add new sections, translate content, generate images, and provide web design and SEO advice. The AI website builder can be bundled into hosting plans and positively impact key business metrics.

articles.title: 28 Adult Products Your Younger Self Would Judge
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: WD-40 introduced a WD-40 pen that can do everything the original formula can (protect against corrosion, loosen rusted parts, drive out moisture, etc.), but in the perfect on-the-go packaging for tight spaces. Dr. Teal's launched a ~limited edition~ Dr. Teal's "Cozy Vanilla Season" Epsom salt magnesium soak made with vanilla, spice, and vetiver essential oils to turn your bathroom into a cozy, calming oasis. New Balance released 608 V5 Cross Trainers which provide ultimate comfort, support, and style.

articles.title: Heinz Beanz sent me 3 new flavours to try and 1 was the worst thing I have ever eaten
articles.author: Rebecca Koncienzcy
articles.summary: Heinz launched three new Beanz flavors: Pizza, Tagine, and Sweet & Sour. These new varieties were inspired by customers and are available exclusively on Ocado and HeinzToHome.co.uk.

articles.title: I tried 3 new Heinz Beanz flavours and 1 was the worst thing I have eaten
articles.author: Rebecca Koncienzcy
articles.summary: Heinz launched three new Beanz flavors: Pizza, Tagine, and Sweet & Sour. These new flavors, developed based on customer input from the 'Heinz Beanz of your Dreamz' competition, are available exclusively on Ocado and HeinzToHome.co.uk. The reviewer had mixed reactions, finding the Pizza Beanz acceptable, the Tagine Beanz bland, and the Sweet & Sour Beanz unpalatable.

articles.title: Early-Stage Startups Reel From AWS Outage
articles.author: Yuliya Chernova
articles.summary: The startup Daisy Edit launched its personal wardrobe platform on Wednesday. The launch coincided with an Amazon Web Services outage, significantly impacting the startup.

articles.title: LG Uplus launches Nugget Light plan extending contracts to five years
articles.author: Yun Ye-Won
articles.summary: LG Uplus has officially launched the 'Nugget Light' internet plan for all customers, extending the contract term up to five years and offering discounted monthly fees. The plan, previously available only to newlyweds, can be bundled with IPTV and fixed-mobile services and is now available through the LG Uplus customer center and Uplus.com.

articles.title: Dyson Quietly Clears Out the Supersonic, Salon-Grade Hair Dryer Now Going for Peanuts
articles.summary: Dyson is clearing out its Supersonic, Salon-Grade Hair Dryer, which is now available at a significantly reduced price.

articles.title: Guinness Nigeria excites Akwa Ibom consumers with Guinness Smooth launch
articles.author: Tunde Oso
articles.summary: Guinness Nigeria has launched Guinness Smooth, a new variant of stout, in Uyo, Akwa Ibom State. Guinness Smooth is described as a refreshing, easy-drinking stout with a fruity and butterscotch flavor, targeting younger consumers. The launch event featured music, entertainment, and showcased the product's smooth and mild profile.

articles.title: 36 Cozy Fall Must-Haves For Your Home Hibernation
articles.author: Chelsea Stuart
articles.summary: Eos launched its new Cr√®me de Pistachio Shea Better Body Lotion, which is getting positive attention from TikTok users who praise its moisturizing properties and scent, comparing it favorably to more expensive lotions. The product's popularity suggests a successful introduction to the market.

articles.title: Australia's favourite hatch gets even better
articles.author: James Chung
articles.summary: Suzuki has launched the 2025 Suzuki Swift Hybrid GLX, starting from $27,490. It features a 1.2-litre 3-cylinder mild-hybrid engine, a 9-inch touchscreen with Android Auto and Apple CarPlay, and enhanced safety features. The Suzuki Swift is currently Australia's cheapest hybrid vehicle.

articles.title: ‚ÄòMANTRAC Digital Service Centre Will Boost Remote Support'
articles.author: Business
articles.summary: Mantrac Nigeria, the authorized dealer for Caterpillar products, has launched a state-of-the-art Digital Service Centre in Ikeja, Lagos. This new facility aims to redefine after-sales support and operational reliability by using remote diagnostics, telematics, and predictive maintenance technology to maximize equipment performance and uptime for customers in Nigeria and West Africa.

articles.title: Amazon joins UAE's 15-minute delivery race with 'Amazon Now'
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Amazon launched Amazon Now, a new ultra-fast delivery service in the UAE. This service promises delivery of everyday essentials in as little as 15 minutes in some areas.

articles.title: Meet the Future of Home Hydration with the Elkay¬Æ‚Ñ¢ Liv EZ
articles.author: The Bay City Tribune
articles.summary: A leading company in the drinking water industry is reimagining its iconic filtered water dispenser for home use.

articles.title: I used Opera Neon for 48 hours, and I'm surprised by how much I enjoyed ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Opera introduced Opera Neon, an AI web browser. Users can personalize their internet experience using it.

articles.title: The Marketing Cloud launches Agent Cloud, a secure and flexible way for brands and agencies to power AI-driven marketing
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The Marketing Cloud, a part of the Stagwell network, has launched Agent Cloud, a secure, unified platform providing access to various AI models. Agent Cloud is designed to empower modern marketing teams with customizable AI assistants.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 battery capacity, charging speed and new cooling system revealed ahead of launch
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: OnePlus will launch the OnePlus 15 in China on October 27, with a potential Indian launch on November 14. The OnePlus 15 features a 7,300mAh battery, 120W wired charging, a new cooling system, and a 165Hz display, and is powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5.

articles.title: Anyone notice we're definitely at enshiattification stage 3 of major internet companies? Anyone?
articles.summary: An unnamed company released a new generation of its cat water fountain. This new version removes a physical button and requires users to download a mobile application to control the fountain's functions. The change reflects a shift in the product's design and functionality.

articles.title: Trump-Approved Coke Could Hit Montana Shelves Soon
articles.author: KCKCPublished:
articles.summary: Coca-Cola is preparing to launch a new version of its soda made with real cane sugar, replacing high fructose corn syrup. The new product, informally called 'Trump Soda,' has received communal endorsement by Trump himself. Montana's release date is currently unknown.
